Screenwriter: Nicole Garcia, Jacques Fieschi, Milena Agus
Production Co: My Unity Production, Lunanime, Les Productions du Trésor, StudioCanal, France 3 Cinéma, Pauline's Angel
Synopsis: After World War II, a free-spirited woman (Marion Cotillard) in a loveless marriage falls in love with another man.
Title: From the Land of the Moon
